content.original: Acid Mortar Shells carry an airburst charge that spreads small Acid Bomblets within an Area. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Acid Mortar Shells carry an airburst charge that spreads small Acid Bomblets within an Area. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 迫击炮酸性弹药携带一种空气冲击装药,在一个区域内散布小型酸性炸弹.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Acid Mortar Shells carry an airburst charge that spreads small Acid Bomblets within an Area. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

content.original: Airburst Mortar Shells separate after a short duration into several bomblets scattering their payload onto a single target. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Airburst Mortar Shells separate after a short duration into several bomblets scattering their payload onto a single target. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 空爆迫击炮弹在短时间内分离成多枚小炸弹,将其战斗部分散到单个目标上.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Thunder Shells, also known as FASCAM Shells, are variations on Thunder LRMs developed by the Terran Hegemony in 2621. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

content.original: Flare Mortal Shells combine a high Powered Flare with a remote Sensor to illuminate a target Area. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Flare Mortal Shells combine a high Powered Flare with a remote Sensor to illuminate a target Area. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 照明迫击炮弹药将高功率的燃烧与远程传感器结合起来,照亮目标区域.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Mortar shells deliver a small Explosive payload, able to damage several units on impact. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Mortar shells deliver a small Explosive payload, able to damage several units on impact. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 迫击炮弹拥有一种小的爆炸战斗部,能够在撞击时损坏多个单位.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Semi Guided Mortar Shells trade a bit of Damage potential for Superior Accuracy. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Semi Guided Mortar Shells trade a bit of Damage potential for Superior Accuracy. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 半制导迫击炮弹具有一定的破坏潜力,但精度较高.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Carrying a hefty payload of Inferno gel does this shell ignite an area around its impact. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Carrying a hefty payload of Inferno gel does this shell ignite an area around its impact. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 携带着大量的炼狱凝胶,这颗炮弹在撞击地面时会造成区域爆炸.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

content.original: Smoke Mortar Shells leave a thick cloud with chaff that is nearly impossible to see through. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.prevOriginal: Smoke Mortar Shells leave a thick cloud with chaff that is nearly impossible to see through. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.
content.content: 烟雾迫击炮弹留下了一层几乎不可能穿透的厚厚的箔片云.在受到严重损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.
